committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide reduced retirement benefits for Members of Congress who remain in office after attaining 65 years of age.

summary.text: Reduces retirement benefits for Members of Congress who remain in office after attaining sixty-five years of age, by 10 percent for each full year the Member remains in office past age 65.

titles.title: A bill to provide reduced retirement benefits for Members of Congress who remain in office after attaining 65 years of age.
